name: Vector to Label
title: Vector to Label
description: Create labelled masks from flow-field vectors.
author: Sudharsan Prativadi (sudharsan.prativadi@labshare.org), Nick Schaub (nick.schaub@nih.gov), Najib Ishaq (najib.ishaq@axleinfo.com)
institution: National Center for Advancing Translational Sciences, National Institutes of Health

inputs.name: inpDir
inputs.description: Input image collection to be processed by this plugin

inputs.name: filePattern
inputs.description: Image-name pattern to use when selecting images for processing.

inputs.name: flowThreshold
inputs.description: Maximum MSE between flow-fields computed from labelled masks against input flow-fields. Defaults to 0.4.

inputs.name: maskSizeThreshold
inputs.description: Maximum fraction of a tile that a labelled object can cover. Defaults to 1.0 to not remove any large masks.

inputs.name: interpolate
inputs.description: Whether to use bilinear/trilinear interpolation on 2d/3d flow-fields respectively. Defaults to true.

inputs.name: numIterations
inputs.description: Number of iterations for which to follow flows. Defaults to 200.

inputs.name: minObjectSize
inputs.description: Minimum number of pixels for an object to be valid. Any object with fewer pixels is removed. Defaults to 15.
